name: ruTorrent
short_description: Feature-rich web frontend for rtorrent - powerful CLI-based torrent client.
description: ruTorrent is a feature-rich web frontend for rtorrent, the robust command-line BitTorrent client. It provides a full-featured interface for managing torrents including multiple files, RSS feeds, scheduling, plugins, and detailed information. It's more powerful than many GUI clients while being lightweight. Perfect for advanced users who want full control over torrenting.
usecases: Manage torrents through powerful web UI.
